Astro + Preact Playground

This page is rendered by Astro and enhances interactivity with Preact islands. Your original site still serves from root files.

Welcome!

This section is hydrated with Preact (Astro island). Smooth and fast.

Why this setup?

  • Astro renders fast static HTML.
  • Preact powers interactive islands only where needed.
  • No changes to Netlify Functions or existing pages yet.
